metadata.title: Wednesday, 5th December, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    whether the Government is aware that there is a looming danger of Shangombo, Sioma and parts of Nalolo Districts being cut off from the rest of the country due to heavy rains;
(b)    if so, what measures are being taken to ensure that the Districts at (a) are not cut off from the rest of the country; and
(c)    whether construction of access roads to Nakabunze Habour, as well as procurement of a pontoon engine are some of the options being considered as a matter of urgency.
(a)    whether the Federation of International Football Associations sends any funds to the Football Association of Zambia for the following programmes:
(i)    purchase of footballs and football attire for various football clubs; and (ii)    construction of football grounds; and
(b)    if so, how often the funds are sent.
